title: How to Get Charcoal Instead of Coal in Minecraft

steps.title: Mine at least four blocks of wood.
steps.content: Mine at least four blocks of wood. Find a tree, then click and hold your mouse over the tree's trunk until a block of wood breaks. Repeat this for each block of wood you mine.

steps.title: Open the crafting menu.
steps.content: Open the crafting menu. Press the E key on your keyboard to open your inventory, which has a small crafting section in the top-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Create twelve planks.
steps.content: Create twelve planks. Right-click your stack of four wood blocks to select half of them, click a box in the crafting section, right-click the stack in your inventory again to select one more block, place it in the "Crafting" box with the other planks, and then click and drag the planks on the right side of the window into your inventory. Be careful to leave at least one wooden block intact.

steps.title: Create four sticks.
steps.content: Create four sticks. Place one block of planks in the top-left box in the "Crafting" section, then place another block of planks in the box below it, and click and drag the resulting sticks into your inventory.

steps.title: Create a crafting table.
steps.content: Create a crafting table. Place one block of planks in each of the four "Crafting" boxes, then move the resulting crafting table into your quick-access bar. This is the row of boxes at the bottom of your inventory.

steps.title: Exit the inventory.
steps.content: Exit the inventory. Press Esc to exit.

steps.title: Place your crafting table on the ground.
steps.content: Place your crafting table on the ground. Click on the crafting table, then right-click the ground.

steps.title: Open the crafting table.
steps.content: Open the crafting table. Right-click the crafting table to do so.

steps.title: Craft a pickaxe, then exit the menu.
steps.content: Craft a pickaxe, then exit the menu. Place a stick each in the bottom-middle and the center boxes in the "Crafting" section, then place a block of planks in the top-left, top-middle, and top-right boxes. A pickaxe will appear; click and drag it into the quick-access bar.

steps.title: Mine eight cobblestone blocks.
steps.content: Mine eight cobblestone blocks. Select your pickaxe to equip it, then find and mine at least eight blocks of cobblestone. Cobblestone is represented by a light-grey block.

steps.title: Return to your crafting table and open it.
steps.content: Return to your crafting table and open it. The "Crafting" window will pop back up.

steps.title: Create a furnace, then exit the menu.
steps.content: Create a furnace, then exit the menu. Place your cobblestone in every "Crafting" box except for the center one, then click and drag the furnace into your quick-access bar.

steps.title: Place your furnace on the ground, then open it.
steps.content: Place your furnace on the ground, then open it. Select your furnace, right-click the ground, and then right-click the furnace.

steps.title: Add the ingredients for charcoal.
steps.content: Add the ingredients for charcoal. To do so: Click your remaining wood block, then click the top box in the furnace. Click your sticks or the stack of planks, then click the bottom box in the furnace.

steps.title: Add the charcoal to your inventory.
steps.content: Add the charcoal to your inventory. Select the charcoal when it appears, then click your inventory.

steps.title: Mine at least four blocks of wood.
steps.content: Mine at least four blocks of wood. Find a tree, then tap and hold a block of wood below it until it breaks. You'll need at least four blocks to create all of the materials you need in order to craft coal.

steps.title: Tap ⋯.
steps.content: Tap ⋯ . It's in the bottom-right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap the crafting table tab.
steps.content: Tap the crafting table tab. You'll see this tab just above the bottom-left corner of the screen. This will open the crafting window.

steps.title: Tap the "Wood Planks" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Wood Planks" icon. It resembles a box with lines across it. Doing so will open the planks on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap 4 x three times.
steps.content: Tap 4 x three times. It's on the right side of the screen. This will create 12 planks. Make sure you leave at least one block of wood in non-plank form.

steps.title: Open the crafting window again, then tap the "Crafting Table" icon.
steps.content: Open the crafting window again, then tap the "Crafting Table" icon. It's identical to the icon on the crafting window tab.

steps.title: Tap 1 x.
steps.content: Tap 1 x . It's on the right side of the screen. This will create a crafting table and place it in your inventory.

steps.title: Place the crafting table on the ground.
steps.content: Place the crafting table on the ground. Select the crafting table in your inventory bar at the bottom of the screen, then tap the ground in front of you.

steps.title: Tap the crafting table.
steps.content: Tap the crafting table. Doing so will open the crafting table.

steps.title: Craft sticks.
steps.content: Craft sticks. Tap the "Stick" icon, then tap 4 x once. This will create four sticks.

steps.title: Create a pickaxe.
steps.content: Create a pickaxe. Tap the "Pickaxe" icon, then tap 1 x . This will create a single wooden pickaxe with which you can mine cobblestone.

steps.title: Mine eight blocks of cobblestone.
steps.content: Mine eight blocks of cobblestone. Cobblestone is light-grey rock found throughout the Minecraft world. You will need to have your pickaxe equipped to do this. You can "mine" your crafting table to place it back in your inventory so that you don't lose it.

steps.title: Return to your crafting table and tap it.
steps.content: Return to your crafting table and tap it. This will re-open the table's interface. If you placed your crafting table in your inventory, place it back on the ground first.

steps.title: Create a furnace.
steps.content: Create a furnace. Tap the "Furnace" icon, then tap 1 x .

steps.title: Place your furnace on the ground, then tap it.
steps.content: Place your furnace on the ground, then tap it. Doing so opens the furnace.

steps.title: Select your furnace's material.
steps.content: Select your furnace's material. Tap the Input box, then tap a wooden block. You cannot use a wooden plank here.

steps.title: Select your furnace's fuel.
steps.content: Select your furnace's fuel. Tap the Fuel box, then tap sticks or planks. The furnace will begin creating charcoal. This will create one coal per wooden block. If you came across any coal while mining cobblestone, you can use that as fuel instead.

steps.title: Double-tap the "Charcoal" icon.
steps.content: Double-tap the "Charcoal" icon. It's in the Result box. Doing so will move it to your inventory. You have successfully created charcoal. You can use the crafting window to create torches as long as you have at least one stick left.

steps.title: Mine at least four blocks of wood.
steps.content: Mine at least four blocks of wood. Find a tree, then aim at a block of wood below it and press the right trigger on your controller. You'll need at least four blocks of wood to craft the tools you'll use to create coal.

steps.title: Open the crafting menu.
steps.content: Open the crafting menu. Press your Xbox's X button or your PlayStation's circle button.

steps.title: Create twelve planks.
steps.content: Create twelve planks. Select the "Wooden Planks" icon, then press A (Xbox) or X (PS) three times. Be careful to leave at least one wooden block intact.

steps.title: Create four sticks.
steps.content: Create four sticks. Scroll right one slot in the crafting menu to select sticks, then press A (Xbox) or X (PS) once.

steps.title: Create a crafting table.
steps.content: Create a crafting table. Scroll right three more times to select the "Crafting Table" icon, then press A (Xbox) or X (PS).

steps.title: Exit the crafting menu.
steps.content: Exit the crafting menu. Press B (Xbox) or the circle button (PS).

steps.title: Place the crafting table on the ground.
steps.content: Place the crafting table on the ground. Select your crafting table using your controller's RB or R1 button, then press the left trigger while facing the ground.

steps.title: Open the crafting table.
steps.content: Open the crafting table. Point your cursor at the crafting table, then press the left trigger.

steps.title: Craft a pickaxe, then exit the menu.
steps.content: Craft a pickaxe, then exit the menu. Open the "Tools" tab by pressing RB (Xbox) or R1 (PS), select the pickaxe, and press A or X . Press B or the circle button to exit.

steps.title: Mine eight cobblestone blocks.
steps.content: Mine eight cobblestone blocks. Select your pickaxe to equip it, then find and mine at least eight blocks of cobblestone. Cobblestone is represented by a light-grey block.

steps.title: Return to your crafting table and open it.
steps.content: Return to your crafting table and open it. Press the left trigger button while facing the crafting table.

steps.title: Create a furnace, then exit the menu.
steps.content: Create a furnace, then exit the menu. Scroll over to the crafting table icon, scroll down one space to select the furnace, and press A or X .

steps.title: Place your furnace on the ground, then open it.
steps.content: Place your furnace on the ground, then open it. This will open a window with two boxes on the left side and one big one on the right.

steps.title: Add the ingredients for charcoal.
steps.content: Add the ingredients for charcoal. To do so: Select a block of wood (not planks), then press Y or the triangle button. Select a stick or a plank, then press Y or the triangle button.

steps.title: Add the charcoal to your inventory.
steps.content: Add the charcoal to your inventory. Select the charcoal when it appears, then press Y or the triangle button.
